overview: Jishan is a TV reporter lost his family members in a crumble down of building. He finds Ustagar, a mafia boss and several his associates responsible for this. He starts kidnapping Ustagar's associates and broadcast confessing their crimes through another TV reporter Trina. When police finds him as the kidnapper, he become absconder but still kidnaps other criminals and send the information to Trina.His final target is to finish Ustagar to save victims like him.
title: Warning
